Name: Zoning, 3033 Avenue V Rezoning, Brooklyn (N 240132 ZRK)
Title: Application number N 240132 ZRK (3033 Avenue V Rezoning) an application submitted by Ford Coyle Properties Inc., pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area. Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 15, Council District 46.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
